person.persName: Oliver J. Epperson (Green County, Kentucky, plasterer and soldier.)

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, plasterer and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Mary Epperson. Married to Elizabeth F. Workman Epperson in Green County, Kentucky, on June 3, 1856. Father of Mary B. Epperson and Ann Jane Epperson. House plasterer in Adair County, Kentucky, in 1850. Plasterer in Green County in 1860. Enlisted in the 13th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a private on October 19, 1861.
